title: 12 Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals 2025: What to Shop Early
description: The summer sale is bringing all sorts of markdowns (with some already here)
author: Blake Bakkila, Sarah Madaus
excerpt: Amazon Prime Day is almost here. Shop some of the best early Prime Day patio furniture deals before everyone else hears about them
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

In the middle of July, we’ll all be trying to get outdoors as much as humanly possible, and thankfully a bunch of Prime Day patio furniture deals are coming down the pike just in time. Historically, Amazon has always chosen to drop their biggest shopping event of the year (besides Prime Big Deal Days) the weeks after July Fourth, and we suspect the same will be true next month.

Our Top Picks for the Best Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals

  • Best Lounge Chair Deal: Best Choice Products Wicker Egg Chair, $420 $300
  • Best Patio Set Deal: Devoko 3-Piece Patio Outdoor Porch Furniture Set, $120 $90
  • Best Outdoor Sofa Deal: Signature Design by Ashley Clare Outdoor Patio Sofa, $1362 $1103

A few other things remain consistent every Prime Day, no matter how chaotic this summer sale can be: The deals extend to many of the same items, including weather-resistant dining sets, stylish outdoor sectionals and sofa sets, hardy woven patio chairs and ottomans, and even some aesthetically pleasing fire pits. That means it can be easy to single out what to look for, and even sometimes shop ahead.

Whether you’re looking for grills ahead of summer BBQs, some more prime seating for poolside lounging, or simply dreaming about refreshing a few of your outdoor pieces that stay out on the lawn in all seasons (we see you, Californians), there are a lot of home deals already popping up ahead of schedule. We scoped out all the early patio furniture deals and curated some of our favorites below. And if you’re really in the mood to shop, learn more about our Amazon favorites and review our top choices for furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels.

Deals on Outdoor Couches and Patio Sets

Whether you’re seeking out an outdoor sofa or a conversation set, there’s lots of lounge-worthy outdoor furniture to peruse already.

Signature Design by Ashley Outdoor Sofa

Devoko 3-Piece Patio Outdoor Porch Furniture Set

Deals on Lounge Chairs and Hammocks

Amazon is already cutting prices on classic hammocks and Adirondack chairs, in addition to long chaises for sunbathing and rocking chairs.

Best Choice Products Wicker Egg Chair

Signature Design by Ashley Clare View Outdoor Eucalyptus Wood Lounge Chair

Polywood R100BL Presidential Rocking Chair

Y- Stop Hammock Hanging Rope Swing Chair

Deals on Umbrellas, Pergolas, and Cabanas

With all that time spent in the sun, you’ll need some shade to keep you cool. Here, a few select deals we found on pergolas and umbrellas that have you covered (quite literally) on the hottest days of the year.

Kbrellaoutlets Patio Umbrella with UPF 50+ Protection

COOS BAY Outdoor Canopy

Deals on Outdoor Decor and Accessories

And sure, your patio furniture set is important, but a little decor goes a long way to make an outdoor space more personal and cozy. Spruce yours up with shelving for your plants and durable rugs, among other outdoor decor deals we’re already seeing marked down.

Bamworld Plant Stand

Permasteel Portable Rolling Patio Cooler

ILANCK Solar Pathway Lights (Set of 8)

Ninja Woodfire 8-in-1 Outdoor Oven
